languages.text: "Но... я всего лишь хотел спасти... я..." {n}В отчаянии мужчина, роняя оружие, закрывает лицо руками. Вы слышите несколько коротких всхлипываний.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Но... я всего лишь хотел спасти... я..." {n}В отчаянии мужчина, роняя оружие, закрывает лицо руками. Вы слышите несколько коротких всхлыпываний.{/n}

languages.text: "But... all I wanted was to save... I..." {n}The man drops his weapon and covers his face with his hands in desperation. You hear several short sobs.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Но... я всего лишь хотел спасти... я..." {n}В отчаянии мужчина, роняя оружие, закрывает лицо руками. Вы слышите несколько коротких всхлипываний.{/n}

"But... all I wanted was to save... I..." {n}The man drops his weapon and covers his face with his hands in desperation. You hear several short sobs.{/n}

languages.text: "Aber ... ich wollte sie doch nur retten ... Ich ..." {n}Der Mann lässt die Waffen fallen und bedeckt verzweifelt das Gesicht mit den Händen. Du hörst mehrere kurze Schluchzer.{/n}
languages.original_text: "But... all I wanted was to save... I..." {n}The man drops his weapon and covers his face with his hands in desperation. You hear several short sobs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Aber ... ich wollte sie doch nur retten ... Ich ..." {n}Der Mann lässt die Waffen fallen und bedeckt verzweifelt das Gesicht mit den Händen. Du hörst mehrere kurze Schluchzer.{/n}

languages.text: « Mais... je voulais simplement sauver... Je... » {n}L'homme laisse tomber son arme et se prend le visage à deux mains, désespéré. Vous entendez plusieurs brefs sanglots.{/n}
languages.original_text: "But... all I wanted was to save... I..." {n}The man drops his weapon and covers his face with his hands in desperation. You hear several short sobs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Mais... je voulais simplement sauver... Je... » {n}L'homme laisse tomber son arme et se prend le visage à deux mains, désespéré. Vous entendez plusieurs brefs sanglots.{/n}

languages.text: “但……我只是想拯救……我……”{n}这个人放下武器，绝望地捂住了脸。你听到了断断续续的抽泣声。{/n}
languages.original_text: "But... all I wanted was to save... I..." {n}The man drops his weapon and covers his face with his hands in desperation. You hear several short sobs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “但……我只是想拯救……我……”{n}这个人放下武器，绝望地捂住了脸。你听到了断断续续的抽泣声。{/n}

languages.text: 「だが…私が望んでいたのは救済…私は…」{n}男は絶望の中で武器を落とし、両手で顔を覆った。数回の短い嗚咽が聞こえる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "But... all I wanted was to save... I..." {n}The man drops his weapon and covers his face with his hands in desperation. You hear several short sobs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「だが…私が望んでいたのは救済…私は…」{n}男は絶望の中で武器を落とし、両手で顔を覆った。数回の短い嗚咽が聞こえる。{/n}

languages.text: «Pero... lo único que quería era salvar... Yo...» {n}El hombre suelta el arma y se tapa la cara con las manos, desesperado. Se oyen varios sollozos cortos.{/n}
languages.original_text: "But... all I wanted was to save... I..." {n}The man drops his weapon and covers his face with his hands in desperation. You hear several short sobs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Pero... lo único que quería era salvar... Yo...» {n}El hombre suelta el arma y se tapa la cara con las manos, desesperado. Se oyen varios sollozos cortos.{/n}

languages.text: "Ama... Tek isteğim kurtarmaktı... Ben..." {n}Adam çaresizlik içinde silahını bırakıp elleriyle yüzünü kapatıyor. Birkaç kısa hıçkırık duyuyorsun.{/n}
